hero.title: Welcome to Lamb Cottage Caravan Park
hero.subtitle: Experience the perfect blend of comfort and nature in our premium caravan park nestled in the heart of the countryside.

welcome.title: Welcome to Lamb Cottage
welcome.content:
Nestled in the picturesque countryside, Lamb Cottage Caravan Park offers the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Our family-run park has been welcoming guests for over 20 years, providing a peaceful retreat where you can reconnect with nature and create lasting memories.

Whether you're looking for a weekend getaway or an extended holiday, our well-maintained facilities and friendly atmosphere ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay for all our guests.

tagline.description: Experience comfort, tranquility, and adventure in our beautiful countryside setting.

about.title: About Lamb Cottage Caravan Park
about.description: Learn about our family-run caravan park and our commitment to providing exceptional countryside holidays.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Discover the story behind Lamb Cottage Caravan Park

introduction.title: Welcome to Lamb Cottage
introduction.content:
Welcome to Lamb Cottage Caravan Park, where tradition meets comfort in the heart of the countryside. Our family-run park has been welcoming guests for over 20 years, providing a peaceful retreat where you can reconnect with nature and create lasting memories.

Whether you're looking for a weekend getaway or an extended holiday, our well-maintained facilities and friendly atmosphere ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay for all our guests.

story.title: Our Story
story.content:
Our family has been welcoming guests for over 20 years, creating a peaceful retreat where memories are made. What started as a small family business has grown into one of the region's most respected caravan parks, while maintaining our personal touch and commitment to excellence.

We take pride in our beautiful 7¬Ω acre site, carefully maintained to provide the perfect balance of comfort and natural beauty.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content:
We are committed to providing exceptional service and maintaining the highest standards for all our guests. Our mission is to create a welcoming environment where families and couples can enjoy the tranquility of the countryside while having access to modern amenities and facilities.

Every aspect of our park is designed with our guests' comfort and enjoyment in mind.

contact.title: Contact Lamb Cottage Caravan Park
contact.description: Get in touch with us for bookings, enquiries, or any questions about your stay.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: We're here to help with all your enquiries

content.introduction: Have questions about your stay or need assistance with booking? Our friendly team is here to help.
content.office_hours: Our reception is open Monday to Friday 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM, weekends 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM.
content.emergency_info: Emergency contact is available 24/7 for existing guests.
